text: Nadezhda Davydovna Tokayeva (, born 1957, in the Soviet Union) is the former wife of Kassym-Jomart Tokayev, being the current President of Kazakhstan. She is a graduate of the Moscow State Institute for History and Archives. Together with her husband, she has a son, Timur (born 1984).http://aktobetimes.kz/pravaya-verhnyaya-novost/7368-zhena-syn-i-otec- prezidenta-tokaeva-kto-oni.html She assumed the role of first lady in March 2019 when her predecessor's husband, Nursultan Nazarbayev, resigned after 29 years in power. She is divorced from Kassym-Jomart Tokayev. She was the honorary president of the United Nations Women's Guild in Geneva in 2011-2012.Aktobe Times ==References== == Links == * Photo Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Kazakhstan
title: Nadezhda Tokayeva
